website_summaries.verdict: Your baby will get lots of mileage out of this chair, with different interactive settings for 12 month, 18 month and 24-month-olds.
pros: Multi-stage chair offers developmentally-targeted settings for 12 months, 18 months and 24 months
Chair mechanism senses when baby sits
plays songs and phrases when baby stands
Arms feature light-up remote and flip book
cons: Chair may be a little small for babies older than 18 months

customer_reviews.title: One of Great Grandsons favorite toys
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair for our great grandsons first birthday. He loved it ! He has owned it for 3 months now and plays with it constantly he enjoys all the sounds, having his very own little chair to sit in and it talking to him when he does. He enjoys raising the seat and having his on little stash.He is a climber so of course he uses it for that. The worst problem is my grand daughter just started potty training him and yes he used the wrong chair.I like the chair because of all the adjustments to teach them and it grows in teaching with them while they play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for a one year old !! The back feet of this chair are extended out further( but not in the way)to prevent it from tipping over. My granddaughter figured out she could lift up the seat and stand in it, much to my dismay, but it's pretty solid . I don't even mind hearing the abc's over and over!! This chair is plastic but has no sharp edges and I would recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Skyegirl

customer_reviews.title: The chair itself and the way it works are good. My main issue is that when delivered
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself and the way it works are good. My main issue is that when delivered, it was just thrown in its original box which was torn, dented and retaped without plastic, card board or anything inside, with parts rattling around. Also partially opened because the tape seemed old and didn't stick properly. It appears used. It was not even placed in a sealed outer box. Sooo disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The color of this little chair is perfect and it is so useful for a little one ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my one year old grandson and he loves it. The color of this little chair is perfect and it is so useful for a little one who is inquisitive and wanting to learn so many different things. I debated about ordering this, but so glad I did after seeing his face light up with happiness. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 18 month old I babysit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cute singing and learning chair for an 18 month old girl that I babysit. She plays with it all the time! She loves opening the seat and hiding her toys in it. She also loves to sit in it when she's eating her snacks or watching her favorite show Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood. It's the perfect height for her as well. It also prevents her from wanting to climb the other furniture in the room which is a big plus! It's been about 3 months now that she has the toy and she still plays with it everyday. I'm very happy with my purchase and highly recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Theresa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase EVER! My daughter LOVES this chair and plays with it all the time. This item is completely invaluable to me and I would buy it over and over again. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Denelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product! A+
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this chair! Lots of sounds, n love that the seat has a little storage compartment for her little people toys n such.
customer_reviews.author: foxysimba

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but came scuffed up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons first birthday. It arrived in a couple days which was nice. I took it out of the box (it came in the regular product box) and assembled it so it would be ready for my son on his birthday. Slightly disappointed that there are some scuff marks on the front that I wasn’t able to remove, and the Fisher Price logo was chipped. But other than those minor things it’s a cute little chair that my son will love to play with when he receives it. It’s a nice size, perfect for little ones. I can’t wait to give it to my son on his birthday this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Learning Chair for Babies from 8 months and Up.
customer_reviews.text: My younger sister-in-law got my toddler this for his 3 year-old birthday. I wish we had it two years earlier. It will make a perfect for babies at or before 12 months when they can sit and are about time to learn to walk. Even it's kind of too late at the age of 3, my toddler still has a lot of fun playing with this stage chair. He loves to press the buttons, turn over the pages to listen to the songs and learn the numbers, shapes colors and more.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON-LOVER

customer_reviews.title: Dirty toy
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a “suppose” to be new toy/ chair for my baby. It came all dirty and doesn’t look new. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Yesica

customer_reviews.title: Buy this ;-)
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made and gives kids a lot of play options. Our grandchild loves it, but has yet to sit on it. She loves opening the seat and putting things in it. She gets so happy when she visits and can play with the chair. She loved it at age 1 and is 1.5 now and still loves it. She enjoys the sounds more now. We enjoy the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Mmccartney

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons first birthday and have nothing to give him because it wasn't packed in a box and was literally thrown onto my porch. Cute item but it would be great if it hadn't been ruined. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves the ABC song this is teaching him in a fun way!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old grandson loves it. He particularly loves the ABC alphabet song. If we’re out and I sing 🎵 ABCDEFG he looks at me, grins and manages the tune with me. He doesn’t have all the letters down yet, but getting there. He loves to sit on the chair. It’s wonderful to see him enjoying this so much. So glad I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: kindle kat

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. One for my niece who just turned one and she loved it. Got another one for my daughter but she’s only 6 months and can only play with the music book on the chair. Overall as a parent, the chair is entertaining for the child. The chair will sing the ABC’s when sat on and say the word up when the child gets up. It’s definitely a learning chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! My 9 month old granddaughter is using it.
customer_reviews.text: My nine month old granddaughter can sit in it and play with her little console toy on the table in front of her. She still needs very close supervision because she doesn't have any idea that she can fall out of it yet. But this is great and she is very amused by the arms that have a little book and phone buttons. Its very low to the floor and the design on the back feet is a great base of support to keep the chair from tipping.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but my almost two year will likely outgrow it soon. Best for smaller babies.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, you can set it for the age of your baby. Every time you turn the pages of the book on the armrest it tells a story about the picture. Every time you sit or get up its says up and down and sings songs. The seat lifts up for storage. My boy loves his big boy chair. It would be perfect if it were only bigger. It's on the small side for my nearly two year old.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best gift money can buy a 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Parents heed the reviews—on its surface this seems to be a pretty dumb toy, but put it in front of a one year old and it wins the prize at Christmas when the kid has fifty other toys to choose from. I was shocked, so was everyone else, but the magic of the stupid yellow chair cannot be denied. But this, trust me, the kid will love it and come back time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Quwinntessa Starber

customer_reviews.title: Came with dirty stains and glue, but baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Package came on time. The product itself came dirty and it does not wipe off. I would love for someone to contact me and let me know what these dark stains are. There is also some type of glue inside the seat and it is in more than one place, still is sticky to the touch. I would not want my baby touching that. I am glad I didn't purchase more as gifts because it would be embaressing to give out a soiled toy. Otherwise, my baby loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: This was a fun gift for my son and helped him to stand ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun gift for my son and helped him to stand up on his own since he got to start from an elevated position. He's 98% height and 96% weight for his height so I don't know if that's why but he frequently had to turn to the side and/or back to use the activities on the chair arms, I think that they should be farther up the arm so that the child can reach towards them. The storage is nice as he liked hiding things in there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids, 1, 3, and 4. They all love it. They like the little songs it plays and they try to sing along with it. They don't really sit in it they like to stand and feel taller or hide their favorite toys in the seat. We have had it over a year and they still love it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's 1 year birthday. His parent's put the batteries in at their house. I was there last night & they finally told me that the chair has never worked. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Pieters

customer_reviews.title: Chair legs don’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if my chair is broke or if this is just how it is but the legs of his chair on the front don’t snap in. The back legs pop in fine but the front ones slide out. So I basically have a lopsided chair that talks. I included a picture that shows how the front legs slide out. On the plus he loves it as a toy but it’s not functional as a chair...
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great product at discount
customer_reviews.text: Great product great discount happy with purchase. Nothing wrong with it. Was considered in acceptable condition but looks like new paid $26. I didn’t think my son would like this product it’s just a chair with a few songs and buttons but he really enjoys climbing on it. And pressing the buttons I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonte

customer_reviews.title: What a great toy! She loves this chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for her 2nd birthday. What a great toy! She loves this chair... and she actually sits in it quite a bit. I have found that she will pull it out to use during TV time, but also sits in it just to play with the arm book and buttons. It's educational and fun to play with. She loves that she can store little things in the seat. I am pleased with this purchase and highly recommend this if you have a toddler! It's going to get lots of use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son had this chair when he was little so when my nephew turned 1 I knew it would be the perfect gift for him. He absolutely loves it although he has already learned it can help him reach higher object when standing on it. Lol! Oh and the songs on it are so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Melc

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun way to learn and communicate
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. Such a fun way to learn and communicate. Shes was just 8months at the time. She loved turning the pages touching the buttons. One great feature about this is the music. Her favourite son is the stand up sit down game. She enjoys standing up and sitting down to it. I was amazed that she knew how to comprehend to stand up and sit down. Another proud mommy moment. She is talking a bit too. How fast they grow.
customer_reviews.author: N.powellTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: We probably used this for 2 weeks after we originally bought it, my daughter just wasn't into it like the old one we had. I just brought it up to see if she would play with it and even after trying 2 new sets of batteries it wont work. So disappointed. This is actually the 3rd fisher price item we have bought new (most things we buy used) that didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Pull up a chair and stay awhile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. It encourages reading by making it a fun environment with plenty of things to do. The under seat storage makes this a focal point of any room, bringing it into play with other activities. Only wish was that it was a bit padded for longer usage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris James

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price box is damaged
customer_reviews.text: Box is trashed. Totally bent all over. Hoping the chair isn’t cracked. The Fisher Brice box is a mess. Amazon box was fine????
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: All around a great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old has been playing with this for a couple of months now. He loves it. There are so many aspects to it that he cycles through - sometimes opening and closing the chair l, sometimes sitting in it and turning the book pages, sometimes hiding his toys in his chair. It’s all around a great toy
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: READY TO LEARN
customer_reviews.text: MY 1 YR old son is very interactive with his toy. I only tend to buy education toys for him and this one hits the mark. My son is very much an "on the go"/ active 1 yr old and tends to climb and stand on chair rather that sitting. So parents take my advice & be very watchful of kids to avoid possible falls.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of A Prince

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair for our grand daughter when she was one year old. She loved it and played with it a lot. I don't recall how long it was after that, but we watched her take her very first steps out of that chair. She was playing with it, sat on it, and next thing we knew she stood up and walked away from it. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: It is Greaaat!
customer_reviews.text: I have no problems with this toy. However the box had been previously opened. There was a very sloppy job of resealing it with a couple pieces of shipping tape. I had to see why it had been resealed. The only thing I saw was there were no batteries, but I'm not sure they were included. For the good news, me and my wife and my daughter loved it. I am sure that 'Little Brody' will also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Donaghy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Great gift for 1 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a baby boy turning 1, and he absolutely LOVES it! It's his first chair, and he loves the little compartment and the book. Even though he doesn't stay seated long, he is really enjoying sitting in a chair that he can get on by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This little chair is packed with fun and will last a long time. Not only are there 3 "learning stages" it also always you to put your child's age in to make it even more developmentally appropriate. The voices on this newer line is much less annoying than some older yoys. It was easy to assemble and most importantly our daughter LOVES it! She sits in it and smiles and dances. She also loves just sitting near it and opening and shutting the seat. She even stand son it and it is study enough to hold her and not tip over. All in all a great toy for $30!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Atwood

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old loves!
customer_reviews.text: 1 year old niece can't get enough of this chair! Highly recommend this. At your family home or if you are an extended family member to have at your house when they pop over it really helps them keep busy and play!
customer_reviews.author: c.s.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my older granddaughter when she was 1. She is now almost 3 and still plays with it. I bought it again from my younger granddaughter when she also turned 1. She loves sitting in and playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Chair is a fun learning toy
customer_reviews.text: The box was a little dented when received but thst did not seem to affect the chair. I was a little surprised that it was delivered in the product box, not an 'Amazon' box. It does require AA batteries. It has buttons that light up & make noise. The ABC Song is one of the things that plays when lifting & lowering the seat. The chair seems to keep her attention. This was for our granddaughter's first birthday and she plays with it a lot - her parents send us videos 😊 Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You have to put it together when you get it there’s about 6 screws but it’s very easy. You set it to there age when you first turn it on and from there it’s ready to use my son got it for his first birthday and absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: My 9 Mo Old Grandson Isn't Too Young
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, totally interactive, and age appropriate levels. It also doesn't look atrocious in our living room :)
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys it. He climbs up and down and stands on this thing. It's very sturdy and fun. You get different modes. My complaints are you'll have to put the battery in yourself and it doesn't have as much music. Most toys come with batteries. This one don't.
customer_reviews.author: SimonAndSally

customer_reviews.title: Bright fun and happy music
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike it is it easy for my ten month old grandson to side out, it needs some kind of cloth or velco to help hold on even with the seatbelt. But it is just a happy little throne and very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Owens

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fun chair!
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair! We've had it almost a year and still use it. It's a great little spot for a child to learn to sit in a chair. It also offers some catchy songs, with a few educational elements. The one thing I would note is that the storage space under the seat is very small. Really just enough space for a couple of board books. One other big positive is that the sound isn't too loud. The little guy can be in the seat playing music and we can barely hear it on the other side of the room. Still, a great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a Kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 1 year old. She LOVES it and won't let anyone else play with it. Not really great for promoting sharing. However, she is 1 year old. She can learn that later.
customer_reviews.author: Fstory

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandsons first birthday. And he loves it,plus as he grows it will grow with him. He sits and plays with it all the time. Its also very reasonably priced for what it does and since its Fisher-Price you know its a name you can trust. We have more children that i'm sure will probably be making us more Grand Children(hopefully not too soon lol)so when that happens i will definitely be buying more of these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your little one
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one we purchased. My grandchildren love them
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The box was small enough to wrap. Assembly was easy and quick. My grandchildren from 1-3 all love the chair. It has different learning levels that can be adjusted. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Treble Smith

customer_reviews.title: Baby favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this chair! This is one of his favored toys to play. I got this toy when he was just 6 months old, he surprise me when he started crawling trying to reach to get to the chair/toy and now his 9 months and his holding on to the chair standing and attempting to dance to the music. He loves to push the buttons!! Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: I.C

customer_reviews.title: Good for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I like this chair I brought it for my 20 month old I do feel that this is for 12-18 month old.My son dont sit in the chair because it’s small and it doesn’t say much or teach much but the volume is loud.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine coaxum

customer_reviews.title: A hit
customer_reviews.text: this silly chair was a hit for my 2 year old cousin. She loves it! Her older sister played with it too. Seems like a good gift option for a 1-3 year old. Built fairly well and fairly sturdy but I can see it tipping so just watch the kids!
customer_reviews.author: LimeyLe

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew on his 1st birthday. I'm giving this product five star not only because I like it, it's because my nephew loves it. First, he didn't wanted to sit on it and I was like sorry little man I got you a bad gift :( and after I left received a message from my sister and saw my nephew sitting on the chair and smiling :). It's too early for me to comment on how good is this as a learning tool but I can let you this, it's a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Redhawk

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 10 month old grandson. He loved it and it’s so close to the ground when he slipped out of the chair it didn’t phase him and he kept playing with the buttons on the arm
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a 1yr old but it came with dark scuffs all over it and gooey stuff on it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the chair for my Sons 1st birthday. He loves it and so does my 2 year old. I would of rated the chair 5 stars but it came with very noticeable dark scuff marks all over it and there was sticking gooey stuff inside the bin under the seat. It was embarrassing with family and friends around and I had to go wash the chair b4 my child played on it . The scuff marks will not come off and the goo is almost impossible to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Toy for Your Littles!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute little chair! My son loves it and his favorite part is being able to push it around the house lol...but seriously it’s a cute little educational toy and doesn’t break the bank since our little ones pretty much outgrow everything overnight 🤣
customer_reviews.author: MrsOdyseee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome learning toy.. much fun! ☺
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter loves this chair! She a little over 1. It's one of her favorite toys and this girl knows how to use it! The packaging a bit damage but chair fine. And I thought I asked for it to be gift wrapped but not.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for my great nephew's first birthday. He absolutely loves it and plays with it daily. Lots of activities to keep him busy. Great quality and just adorable! He sits in it just fine too.
customer_reviews.author: MBeach

customer_reviews.title: Sit n play
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair brought it 1st for my daughter who is now 5 and again for my son who is 1. Good learning tool. The seat even lifts up so they can store a few things if they want my
customer_reviews.author: The Gabriel family

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little chair for a 1 year old toddler. The chair is age appropriate has three different level for learning. The only negative is the chair is kinda of small.
customer_reviews.author: Perri

customer_reviews.title: Prefect to occupy a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gift for a little boy, who is into everything, but to small to escape his baby gate. 1st thing he did was to stand on seat to see if he wad tall enough. Hides, alsorts of things in storage seat. Loves the remote attachment. And is always singing.
customer_reviews.author: Zoozie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sons first birthday and he loves it. Best chair and most affordable! Win win with this product. Does not come with batteries. Perfect toy for the curious yet sit-on-everything little one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for toddler
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does my 18 mo granddaughter. She gets to play with a remote-like toy and a colorful and playful books, too, and she loves the music.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable...
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little chair and my little 11 month old grandson enjoys it. The seat lifts to store small books or little toys. He likes the book attached to the arm of the chair...chair is bright yellow and made of sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Play for all stages
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loved this toy whenever he would go to his cousins’ house when he was a little baby. When Christmas came, I knew right away my 10 month old would love this. They both play with this every day. It has different stages you can put it on and teaches numbers, words, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair! She was a year when I got it and already is starting to understand shapes and color when I prompt her. So educational and fun for her to feel like a big girl.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves this. It was a great value for the money. Very fast shipping. I recommend this for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old granddaughter. She loves it. She has short little legs and this is low enough to the ground for her to actually sit on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old twin grand daughters love their little chairs. It was a good buy! The little games and alphabet helper are nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cessna

customer_reviews.title: Toddler uses this more and more.
customer_reviews.text: We liked this from the day it arrived and now at 18 months he loves it even more. Puts small toys in the seat and often stops to sit in it just when walking by.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Buttons, Lights, and Sound!  I Think She Likes It!
customer_reviews.text: My first granddaughter Seemed to be excited with her new entertainment chair. She has just started walking and I imagine she will enjoy it for at least another year.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl D Dickson

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves his new seat! He drags or pushes it with him wherever he goes. He loves playing and pushing all the different buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a little one around 1-2 years old. I don't think it's going to be used much by a toddler older than 2.5 though. It was a cheap price for the concept.
customer_reviews.author: MasterReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers like the music to bounce to
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. She isn't old enough yet to full enjoy it. She is almost a year old. But I think she will really love when she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old granddaughter LOVES this chair! Got one for a friend's little girl who just turned one and my granddaughter played with it so much I had to get her one. Lots of activities, love the fact you can adjust it depending on the child's age. Plus it's a great size and doesn't take up too much room. Comes with extra toys that are stored inside the chair seat. Very durable and I anticipate she'll get a great deal of use out of it over the next couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 1 year old!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our son for his first birthday. At first, he didn't really take to it. After he started walking more confidently, he loved it! It was fun watching him learn to sit in it. In the beginning, he would only stand and then sit. Now, at 15 months old, he can back up and sit down. He also climbs on it for fun and to see out of the window. I don't mind, as he needs to learn balance and stepping up/down, and this is short enough that he doesn't get hurt if he takes a tumble.
customer_reviews.author: TheWife71412

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: loved loved this chair I bought for our grandson who is 1 year old-has so many things that tickle his fancy and its the perfect size!plus it's something he can learn with as he gets older-we loved it!
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a present when he was 10 months old and it took a couple of weeks for him to figure it out. However, once he did, it quickly became his "buddy." He loves to drag it all over the house, use it as s stepping stool, push the buttons, lift the seat up to hide things and flip the pages of the book. Since he uses it so much, we have had to change the batteries when he turned 13 months- a little cumbersome, but not as bad as others made it sound.
customer_reviews.author: Melodee

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible but not quite what we hoped
customer_reviews.text: My four year old is having more fun with it then my 2 year old and that lasted for all of five minutes. But I figure he can use it as a chair.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift and my nephew loves it. Its great for kids over the age of 1. Its sturdy because he is heavy handed.
customer_reviews.author: Raena

customer_reviews.title: Beware of wooden floors
customer_reviews.text: The bottom scratches the floor because the kids can push their legs and slide around
customer_reviews.author: Ana Jay

customer_reviews.title: First chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so cute! Doubles as a toy and furniture. Has stages to grow with baby. Our kiddo loves his.
customer_reviews.author: kborgwald

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to a 1 year old and when it was set up he went straight for the chair and investigated. He enjoys sitting in as well so has multiple uses
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Love This Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun and entertaining toy. My nine month old really loves playing with it. She has learned to pull up and stand with it, and enjoys the various sounds it makes. I appreciate that there is a lower volume setting. It also cleans easily since it is all plastic-always nice. Great price point for a toy that gets a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a nice giftable product
customer_reviews.text: We gifted it to a 14-month old, and it's getting used quite a bit. Nice bright color, and good music/storage, so can't go wrong with a Throne for your little ones to lounge around in.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay A.

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this chair. Love the color and quality . Music is plus. Very comfortable for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this chair. Love the color and quality . Music is plus. Very comfortable for toddlers
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT SINGING "HAPPY CHAIR"!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE TO START BY SAYING I ADMIRE THIS LITTLE CHAIR! I call it "The Happy Chair" as every time my daughter sits (or stands) on it, she's extremely happy and excited. lately, we have used this chair to feed her in as she enjoys that when she sits down, the chair responds by singing. Also, it has 3 different learning stages with a cute little flippable musical booklet and remote that sing and talk as well. A definite SLAM DUNK! Mom has done it again!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Rachel

customer_reviews.title: 16 month old loves this chair
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 month old son loves this chair! He sits on it to get it to sing the ABC's and then dances in the chair! He loves to lift the seat up and down to hear it say "up" and "down", and he loves hiding things in it. Sometimes I will hide things in it for him to find later when he plays with it, and he always is delighted to find an unexpected treasure!
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES this chair! We call it her "perch". There are a variety of songs on there, so you don't get too sick of hearing the same one! I also love that it levels up with your child's age!
customer_reviews.author: IAST

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these , one for my 11th grand and one for my only great grand born 2 months apart. I am sure they will love.
customer_reviews.author: coachmama

customer_reviews.title: Alot of learning opportunities for young children to help their development.
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift fo a one year old girl. She loves it! She sits in it all the time and plays with the interactive learning toys included. A good value and alot of learning activities. Good choice .
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Newburg

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for one year old!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my granddaughter’s first birthday, 2 months ago. It was her favorite gift then and still plays with it regularly. Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: 5StarrFam

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to put together too
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old daughter absolutely loves this chair. She doesn't sit in it but she loves to raise the seat up and down, press the buttons on the remote and flip the pages in the book. The song it sings on the page with the frog will get stuck in your head!! I haven't noticed a whole lot of difference in the different levels it has, but I've also not paid a lot of attention. It was super easy to put together too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: Remember if you're going to gift it that it does not come assembled
customer_reviews.text: This is a toddler's dream. It speaks to you it has lots of controls it has sensory things to feel. My daughter loves her chair
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: I haven't heard anything bad about it but I have not been around the child that received this gift either the reviews for great so I purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed Black all over chair won’t wash off
customer_reviews.text: When opened box parts were loose in box and chair had black stains all over that won’t wash off almost like factory defects. Was so excited for my grandson to have this and now very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My two young grandsons just love this little chair!! They are far away from me but a video my son sent me shows the 2-year old enjoying it It was a birthday gift for him. The three year old likes it too but is getting too big to get out of it! This was a wonderful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Chair
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this toy! Fisher price still makes great toys!It teaches in fun ways that my 2 yr old nephew loves!I only wish that the height could be adjusted as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Ms DMW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 2-3 year old babies .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old grandkid .. she is enjoying it .. it will lasts long .
customer_reviews.author: Jollyannie John thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for youngsters
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters loved it! Very entertaining! All children loves chairs their own size!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie J Geier

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. Got it for Christmas when she was 9 months old. Very entertaining
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Laranko

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one instead of the pink chair because unfortunately they want almost $10 more for the other one simply because it’s pink! My daughter loves this chair though and on the bright side, if we ever have a boy it’s unisex!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Mechler

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Chair
product_meta.description: The Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Chair is baby’s very own place to sit and discover new things! This “magic” ABC seat knows when baby sits, activating songs and phrases when baby stands. Press the light-up remote or flip book pages to hear numbers, shapes and more. Lift the cushion to reveal more fun surprises. Every baby develops at their own pace, and Smart Stages gives you the ability to select the stage that’s best for your child! There are a variety of developmentally appropriate songs, phrases and sounds within three levels of play – just slide the switch or enter baby’s age for automatic level changes.
feature_bullets: Interactive musical toddler chair with 50+ sing-along songs, tunes and phrases that teach first words, numbers, shapes, colors and more
Seat activates songs & phrases when baby sits & stands
Includes Smart Stages technology – learning content changes as baby grows, 3 levels of play offer fresh songs, phrases & sounds for your little one’s age & stage
Busy activities include an illustrated flip-book & light-up remote control with buttons to press
For infants and toddlers ages 12 months and older

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,594 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
